text-node.description: Check mandatory Email fields be available EmailSubject - This will be the subject of email and Content Asset ID - This will contain the email content Validate the other optional fileds against validation format like EmailFrom, EmailTo, EmailCC, EmailBCC
Replace the placeholder of content in content asset with parameters value available in HashMap (pdict variable) having key same as placeholder in content Asset
Template will be fixed and picked based on locale. Also header and footer are fixed as specified in template

key-binding.alias: "Order No. does not Exist, Please enter valid Order No."
"Email Id provided in url does not match with Email_id used while checking out Order"
"Either OrderNumber or email-id is missing in the input paramters of the requested URL"
"This Service is not avaiable on Production site , please use Staging URL"
